name: Phalanx Fighter
entries: Your ability to fight cooperatively with other while protecting your allies grants you the following benefits:

items: While within 5 feet of an ally wielding a shield you and the ally gain a +1 to AC and Dexterity saving throws. A creature can only benefit from this feature once.
While within 5ft of a least two allies the first attack roll you make on your turn has advantage.
